item.title: 解决ping github.com失败
item.author: 菜菜
item.description: 问题描述 在将本地的远程仓库push到github上时，出现报错： ssh: Could not resolve hostname github.com: Temporary failure in name resolution fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists. 排除ssh的问题后，在cmd中对目标地址进行ping操作： 1 ping github.com 出现如下错误提示： Ping request could not find host github.com. Please check the name and try again. 解决方案 1 首先获取 github.com IP 地址 IP 地址查询： Click 通过上述网站查询得到 github.com IP 地址如下
